Text:
Mangas in general are better than the anime. The storyline in the anime Hellsing does not follow the same storyline as the mange. Hellsing Ultimate does though.

Just thought I would mention in. Thanks for posting this by the way. Been looking for some new volumes
I belive there are two more chapters out than the ones I uploaded. Yes mangas is almost always better than the anime but the hellsing anime is realy good.

I agree, the anime rekindled my love for anime many years back.

Two more .... I better get hunting then, thanks again
If you want to keep upptodate you should visit #maximumt@irc.irchighway.net irc is your friend there are otehr releasegroups too but as far as  I know theese are in the lead.^^
